Fantasy Fashion - Savage Legs and Feet (Female)
kDesc
A great accompaniment to any of your outfits. You may be a savage, but there is no reason to not look good.[#Legal]
L'accompagnement idéal pour tous vos costumes. Être sauvage ne dispense pas d'avoir la classe.[#Legal]
Auch Wilde können gut aussehen: Passt gut zu allen deinen Outfits.[#Legal]
Un ottimo abbinamento per qualsiasi completo. Potrai essere un barbaro, ma non c'è motivo per non esser bello.[#Legal]
Un gran accesorio para cualquier cosa que lleves puesta. Tal vez seas salvaje, pero no es razón para no tener un aspecto estupendo.[#Legal]
どんな衣装にも合う。勇猛な戦士でも、格好よくしなきゃどうする？[#Legal]
어떠한 의상과도 잘 어울리는 아이템. 야만인은 강해 보여야만 합니다.[#Legal]
A great accompaniment to any of your outfits. You may be a savage, but there is no reason to not look good.[#Legal]
您任何裝備的極佳搭配。雖然您可能是個蠻族，但是這並不意味著您不能令人羡慕。[#Legal]
您任何裝備的極佳搭配。雖然您可能是個蠻族，但是這並不意味著您不能令人羡慕。[#Legal]
A great accompaniment to any of your outfits. You may be a savage, but there is no reason to not look good.[#Legal]
